value: Pintia was one of the easternmost Vaccean cities in the old Vaccean region. Its period of greatest splendor corresponds to the Second Iron Age, between 400 BC and the turn of the era. The Pintia Project, developed by the CEVFW of the University of Valladolid, aims to preserve the cultural heritage left by our ancestors in this site, with special attention to one of its most sensitive areas: the cemetery of Las Ruedas.
